allow: Bash(docker exec candyhire-portal-mysql mysql -u root -pCandyHire2024Root -e "SHOW DATABASES;")
Bash(tail -n 1 echo "" echo "Jobs:" docker exec candyhire-portal-mysql mysql -uroot -pCandyHire2024Root candyhire_tenant_1 -e "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jobs WHERE tenant_id=''''1'''';")
Bash(tail -n 1 echo "" echo "Candidates:" docker exec candyhire-portal-mysql mysql -uroot -pCandyHire2024Root candyhire_tenant_1 -e "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM candidates WHERE tenant_id=''''1'''';")

Bash(echo "âœ¨ ===== RIEPILOGO COMPLETO FINALE =====" echo "" docker exec candyhire-portal-mysql mysql -uroot -pCandyHire2024Root candyhire_tenant_1 -e "
SELECT ''''COMPANIES'''' as Category, COUNT(*) as Total FROM companies WHERE tenant_id=''''1''''
UNION ALL
SELECT ''''JOBS'''' as Category, COUNT(*) as Total FROM jobs WHERE tenant_id=''''1''''
UNION ALL
SELECT ''''CANDIDATES (Total)'''' as Category, COUNT(*) as Total FROM candidates WHERE tenant_id=''''1''''
UNION ALL
SELECT CONCAT(''''  - '''', candidate_type) as Category, COUNT(*) as Total FROM candidates WHERE tenant_id=''''1'''' GROUP BY candidate_type;
")
